name: Free Health Screening Camp
description: Free health screening for adults. Includes basic check-ups and blood pressure monitoring.

name: Child Vaccination Camp
description: A camp dedicated to vaccinating children against common diseases.

name: Diabetes Awareness and Screening
description: An informative and screening camp focusing on diabetes prevention and management.

name: Eye Care Camp
description: Free eye check-ups, vision tests, and consultations with an ophthalmologist.

name: Mental Health Counseling Camp
description: Mental health screening and counseling services provided by licensed psychologists.

name: Dental Check-Up Camp
description: Free dental check-ups, cleanings, and consultations with a dentist.

name: Blood Donation Drive
description: Donate blood to save lives. Free health screening and snacks provided.

name: Cancer Screening Camp
description: Early detection of cancer through screening and consultation with oncologists.

name: Senior Citizens Health Camp
description: Health screenings and consultations focused on the elderly, including mobility and cognitive tests.
